Trèfle.name: Club
Trèfle.description: Observant and ingenious, he or she is always exceptionally intelligent. Clubs are multi-graduated characters who apply their genius to the preparation phases and plan the group’s actions. They are often the brains of an agent’s team, and an indispensable part of it.

Carreau.name: Diamond
Carreau.description: Often professional and impressive, he or she is always sure of his or her technical skills, whether in demolition, mechanics or piloting. Diamonds are expert technicians who can improvise with ease, and who have learned not to let themselves be taken for a ride. They sometimes have a dark past...

Cœur.name: Heart
Cœur.description: Charming and playful, he or she is very sure of his or her charm, always elegantly dressed. Hearts are social characters par excellence, who know how to chat, seduce or imitate in order to divert attention, create sensational diversions or win favor with a target.

Pique.name: Spade
Pique.description: As elegant as he or she is graceful, he or she is immovably dexterous and discreet. Spades are capable of impressive physical prowess as well as being professional burglars. They are often the mover and shaker at the heart of the agency’s action.
